title: Bloomberg Markets: Fiat Chrysler Self-Driving Autos Partnership
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fiat Chrysler Self-Driving Autos Partnership
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jamie Butters U.S. Autos Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV joining BMW AG and Intel Corp. in developing a platform for self-driving vehicles, giving the Italian-American automaker new technology partners and adding heft to their existing coalition.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
